info.name: Aramex Shipping API Test Collection
info.description: Collection for testing Aramex Shipping API endpoints - CreateShipment, PrintLabel, CalculateRate, etc.

request.description: Create a test shipment using the test environment
Print label for a test shipment
Create a live shipment (USE WITH CAUTION)

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tns="http://ws.aramex.net/ShippingAPI/v1/Service_1_0">
    <soap:Header>
        <tns:ClientInfo>
            <tns:AccountCountryCode>SA</tns:AccountCountryCode>
            <tns:AccountEntity>RUH</tns:AccountEntity>
            <tns:AccountNumber>{{test_account_number}}</tns:AccountNumber>
            <tns:AccountPin>{{test_account_pin}}</tns:AccountPin>
            <tns:UserName>{{test_username}}</tns:UserName>
            <tns:Password>{{test_password}}</tns:Password>
            <tns:Version>v1.0</tns:Version>
            <tns:Source>52</tns:Source>
        </tns:ClientInfo>
    </soap:Header>
    <soap:Body>
        <tns:CreateShipments>
            <tns:Transaction>
                <tns:Reference1>{{test_reference}}</tns:Reference1>
                <tns:Reference2></tns:Reference2>
                <tns:Reference3></tns:Reference3>
                <tns:Reference4></tns:Reference4>
                <tns:Reference5></tns:Reference5>
            </tns:Transaction>
            <tns:Shipments>
                <tns:Shipment>
                    <tns:Reference1>{{test_reference}}</tns:Reference1>
                    <tns:Reference2></tns:Reference2>
                    <tns:Reference3></tns:Reference3>
                    <tns:Shipper>
                        <tns:Reference1>{{test_reference}}</tns:Reference1>
                        <tns:Reference2></tns:Reference2>
                        <tns:AccountNumber>{{test_account_number}}</tns:AccountNumber>
                        <tns:PartyAddress>
                            <tns:Line1>{{test_shipper_address}}</tns:Line1>
                            <tns:Line2></tns:Line2>
                            <tns:Line3></tns:Line3>
                            <tns:City>{{test_shipper_city}}</tns:City>
                            <tns:StateOrProvinceCode></tns:StateOrProvinceCode>
                            <tns:PostCode>{{test_shipper_postcode}}</tns:PostCode>
                            <tns:CountryCode>{{test_shipper_country}}</tns:CountryCode>
                        </tns:PartyAddress>
                        <tns:Contact>
                            <tns:Department></tns:Department>
                            <tns:PersonName>{{test_shipper_name}}</tns:PersonName>
                            <tns:Title></tns:Title>
                            <tns:CompanyName>{{test_shipper_company}}</tns:CompanyName>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1>{{test_shipper_phone}}</tns:PhoneNumber1>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1Ext></tns:PhoneNumber1Ext>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2></tns:PhoneNumber2>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2Ext></tns:PhoneNumber2Ext>
                            <tns:FaxNumber></tns:FaxNumber>
                            <tns:CellPhone>{{test_shipper_phone}}</tns:CellPhone>
                            <tns:EmailAddress>{{test_shipper_email}}</tns:EmailAddress>
                            <tns:Type></tns:Type>
                        </tns:Contact>
                    </tns:Shipper>
                    <tns:Consignee>
                        <tns:Reference1>{{test_reference}}</tns:Reference1>
                        <tns:Reference2></tns:Reference2>
                        <tns:AccountNumber></tns:AccountNumber>
                        <tns:PartyAddress>
                            <tns:Line1>{{test_consignee_address}}</tns:Line1>
                            <tns:Line2></tns:Line2>
                            <tns:Line3></tns:Line3>
                            <tns:City>{{test_consignee_city}}</tns:City>
                            <tns:StateOrProvinceCode></tns:StateOrProvinceCode>
                            <tns:PostCode>{{test_consignee_postcode}}</tns:PostCode>
                            <tns:CountryCode>{{test_consignee_country}}</tns:CountryCode>
                        </tns:PartyAddress>
                        <tns:Contact>
                            <tns:Department></tns:Department>
                            <tns:PersonName>{{test_consignee_name}}</tns:PersonName>
                            <tns:Title></tns:Title>
                            <tns:CompanyName>{{test_consignee_company}}</tns:CompanyName>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1>{{test_consignee_phone}}</tns:PhoneNumber1>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1Ext></tns:PhoneNumber1Ext>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2></tns:PhoneNumber2>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2Ext></tns:PhoneNumber2Ext>
                            <tns:FaxNumber></tns:FaxNumber>
                            <tns:CellPhone>{{test_consignee_phone}}</tns:CellPhone>
                            <tns:EmailAddress>{{test_consignee_email}}</tns:EmailAddress>
                            <tns:Type></tns:Type>
                        </tns:Contact>
                    </tns:Consignee>
                    <tns:ThirdParty>
                        <tns:Reference1>{{test_reference}}</tns:Reference1>
                        <tns:Reference2></tns:Reference2>
                        <tns:AccountNumber>{{test_account_number}}</tns:AccountNumber>
                        <tns:AccountPin>{{test_account_pin}}</tns:AccountPin>
                        <tns:PartyAddress>
                            <tns:Line1>{{test_shipper_address}}</tns:Line1>
                            <tns:Line2></tns:Line2>
                            <tns:Line3></tns:Line3>
                            <tns:City>{{test_shipper_city}}</tns:City>
                            <tns:StateOrProvinceCode></tns:StateOrProvinceCode>
                            <tns:PostCode>{{test_shipper_postcode}}</tns:PostCode>
                            <tns:CountryCode>{{test_shipper_country}}</tns:CountryCode>
                        </tns:PartyAddress>
                        <tns:Contact>
                            <tns:Department></tns:Department>
                            <tns:PersonName>{{test_shipper_name}}</tns:PersonName>
                            <tns:Title></tns:Title>
                            <tns:CompanyName>{{test_shipper_company}}</tns:CompanyName>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1>{{test_shipper_phone}}</tns:PhoneNumber1>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber1Ext></tns:PhoneNumber1Ext>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2></tns:PhoneNumber2>
                            <tns:PhoneNumber2Ext></tns:PhoneNumber2Ext>
                            <tns:FaxNumber></tns:FaxNumber>
                            <tns:CellPhone>{{test_shipper_phone}}</tns:CellPhone>
                            <tns:EmailAddress>{{test_shipper_email}}</tns:EmailAddress>
                            <tns:Type></tns:Type>
                        </tns:Contact>
                    </tns:ThirdParty>
                    <tns:ForeignHAWB></tns:ForeignHAWB>
                    <tns:TransportType>0</tns:TransportType>
                    <tns:ShippingDateTime>{{$timestamp}}</tns:ShippingDateTime>
                    <tns:DueDate>{{$timestamp}}</tns:DueDate>
                    <tns:PickupLocation>Reception</tns:PickupLocation>
                    <tns:PickupGUID></tns:PickupGUID>
                    <tns:Comments>Test shipment from Postman SOAP</tns:Comments>
                    <tns:AccountingInstrcutions></tns:AccountingInstrcutions>
                    <tns:OperationsInstructions></tns:OperationsInstructions>
                    <tns:Details>
                        <tns:Dimensions>
                            <tns:Length>10</tns:Length>
                            <tns:Width>10</tns:Width>
                            <tns:Height>10</tns:Height>
                            <tns:Unit>CM</tns:Unit>
                        </tns:Dimensions>
                        <tns:ActualWeight>
                            <tns:Value>0.5</tns:Value>
                            <tns:Unit>KG</tns:Unit>
                        </tns:ActualWeight>
                        <tns:ProductGroup>EXP</tns:ProductGroup>
                        <tns:ProductType>EPX</tns:ProductType>
                        <tns:PaymentType>P</tns:PaymentType>
                        <tns:PaymentOptions></tns:PaymentOptions>
                        <tns:Services></tns:Services>
                        <tns:NumberOfPieces>1</tns:NumberOfPieces>
                        <tns:DescriptionOfGoods>Test Package SOAP</tns:DescriptionOfGoods>
                        <tns:GoodsOriginCountry>SA</tns:GoodsOriginCountry>
                        <tns:Items>
                            <tns:ShipmentItem>
                                <tns:PackageType>Box</tns:PackageType>
                                <tns:Quantity>1</tns:Quantity>
                                <tns:Weight>
                                    <tns:Value>0.5</tns:Value>
                                    <tns:Unit>KG</tns:Unit>
                                </tns:Weight>
                                <tns:Comments>Test item SOAP</tns:Comments>
                                <tns:Reference></tns:Reference>
                            </tns:ShipmentItem>
                        </tns:Items>
                        <tns:AdditionalProperties></tns:AdditionalProperties>
                        <tns:CustomsValueAmount>
                            <tns:Value>100</tns:Value>
                            <tns:CurrencyCode>SAR</tns:CurrencyCode>
                        </tns:CustomsValueAmount>
                    </tns:Details>
                </tns:Shipment>
            </tns:Shipments>
            <tns:LabelInfo>
                <tns:ReportID>9201</tns:ReportID>
                <tns:ReportType>URL</tns:ReportType>
            </tns:LabelInfo>
        </tns:CreateShipments>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

request.description: Create shipment using SOAP protocol in test environment
